role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs a video editor on almost any platform (Shotcut on Linux)
role_description_full_overview: Shotcut is a free and open-source cross-platform video editing application for FreeBSD, Linux, macOS and Windows. Started in 2011 by Dan Dennedy, Shotcut is developed on the MLT Multimedia Framework, in development since 2004 by the same author.
